long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The chrome extension is created by DSS Science LLC. This extension provides you a function to generate a status report card that lists out all the cards under these lists "Deploy", "Deploy, Skip", "Done" and "Done, Skip" list in your trello board.  We use this chrome extension at the end of each sprint to generate a status report card that list all the story we accomplished in the sprint.  After you download this extension, you can click on the DSS logo icon on the upper right side of your chrome browser.  Have fun!
